Reviews.Title: Worked fine on GadSpot/VCenter 1500
Reviews.Author: LMRoss
Reviews.Content: We wanted to get some more life from these older cameras and these did the trick for two out of three areas. I was fairly sure or third location was to shallow and I was right. None the less, these worked and saved me alot of cash.

ProductInfo.Features:
Product Name : CCTV Lens;Fit for : CCTV Camera
Focal Length : 2.5mm;Mount : CS
Format : 1/3";Aperture(F) : 1.4
Mount Thread Dia. : 25mm/1'';Size (without cap) : 28 x 17mm / 1.1" x 0.7"(D*L)
Weight : 30g;Package Content : 1 x CCTV Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Gino 1/3" CCD Wide Angle 2.5mm Lens F1.4 CS for CCTV Board Video Camera
